name: Commune With Spirits
text:
The nearest friendly hero names a color, you may then **choose one —**
- Discard a card of that color, If you do, perform any one action on that card.
- Retrieve a discarded card of that color.

name: Turn Into ice
text:
**Choose one —**
- A hero in range with an unresolved card may choose to retrieve that card. If they do not, name a color; that hero discard a card of that color, if able.
- Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

name: Cold Touch
text: A hero in range with an unresolved card may choose to retrieve that card. If they do not, name a color; that hero discard a card of that color, if able.

name: Frost Dagger
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you target a hero, that hero discards a card, if able.
**Next turn, after playing cards:** That hero may retrieve that card.

name: Frost Spear
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you target a hero, name a color. That hero discards a card of that color, if able.
**Next turn, after playing cards:** That hero may retrieve that card.

name: Frost Scepter
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you target a hero, name a color. that hero discards a card of that color, if able.
**End of next turn:** That hero may retrieve that card.

name: Spirit Wolf
text: If you have a card in the discard, target a minion in range, or a hero adjacent to you. Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Spirit Bear
text: If you have a card in the discard, target a unit in range. Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Glacial Barrier
text:
Place an ::token_ice:: ice token in radius, adjacent to another ice token, if able.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative penalty for every ice token they are adjacent to.

name: Wall of Frost
text:
Place up to 2 ::token_ice:: ice tokens in radius, adjacent to another ice token, if able.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative penalty for every ice token they are adjacent to.

name: Pack ice
text:
Place up to 3 ::token_ice:: ice tokens in radius, adjacent to another ice token, if able.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative penalty for every ice token they are adjacent to.

name: Ancestral Totem
text:
Place a ::token_totem:: totem token in radius.
If a friendly melee minion adjacent to a totem would be defeated, you may remove the totem instead.

name: Venerated Totem
text:
Place a ::token_totem:: totem token in radius.
If a friendly minion adjacent to a totem would be defeated, you may remove the totem instead.
Totems are immune to enemy actions.

name: Cold Snap
text:
The nearest enemy hero in radius discards a card, if able.
**Next turn, after playing cards:** That hero may retrieve that discarded card.

name: Snowstorm
text:
Name a color. The nearest enemy hero in radius discards a card of that color, if able.
**Next turn, after playing cards:** That hero may retrieve a discarded card of that color.

name: Bilizzard
text:
Name a color. The nearest enemy hero in radius discards a card of that color, if able.
**End of next turn:** That hero may retrieve a discarded card of that color.

name: Guardian Spirit
text: If you have a card in the discard, a friendly hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Vengeful Spirit
text: If you have a card in the discard, you, or a friendly hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Reign of Winter
text: Whenever any enemy hero in play retrieves a card as a result of an action, that hero discards a card, if able, and you may retrieve your discarded card.
